sentences.en: “We used to work and eat,” Ms. Devi said, her face etched by decades of blistering winters, her fingers thick from summers of tilling the soil.
sentences.cn: 德薇的脸上蚀刻几十年冬天风霜，夏天的劳作使她的手变得又粗有厚，她说：“我们以前就是干活和吃饭。

sentences.en: a glass tankard with his initials etched on it
sentences.cn: 刻有他姓名首字母的玻璃大酒杯

sentences.en: After that, a layer of nickel was electrodeposited on the opal, which was then etched away. The porosity of the nickel layer was then increased using electropolishing.
sentences.cn: 然后，在猫眼石结构表面用电沉积法镀上一层镍膜，之后把猫眼石蚀刻掉，再经过电解抛光，增加这些镍膜空隙度。

sentences.en: Anthea's face was etched with horror.
sentences.cn: 安西娅 的脸上流露出恐惧.

sentences.en: Crosses were etched into the walls.
Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: His grief was etched into every line of his face.
Sign etched on the job officially here.
sentences.cn: 标牌的作业正式蚀刻在这里开始。

sentences.en: Some hotel signage etched pattern is needed, it is how to make the principle of it?
sentences.cn: 一些酒店的标识牌的花纹是需要蚀刻的，那是如何制作的原理呢？

sentences.en: The acid etched holes in the crystal surface.
sentences.cn: 那种酸在晶体表面蚀刻出一些小孔。

sentences.en: The hammer's silvery head was etched with holy runs and its haft was meticulously wrapped in blue leather.
sentences.cn: 锤子头是纯银制成的，雕刻着神圣符文，而握柄则被精心地包裹在蓝色的皮革中。

sentences.en: The image of their son holding up the championship trophy would be etched on their memories forever.
sentences.cn: 他们永远也不会忘记儿子高举着冠军奖杯的样子.

sentences.en: The lines were so finely etched as to be invisible from a distance.
sentences.cn: 线条被蚀刻得如此精细，在远处看都看不见。

sentences.en: The stained-glass panels are etched and then handpainted using traditional methods.
sentences.cn: 彩色玻璃板先经过蚀刻，然后用传统技法手工着色。

sentences.en: The ugly scene in the study was still etched in her mind.
sentences.cn: 书房里丑陋的一幕在她脑海中依旧清晰。

sentences.en: This stark image will remain etched in the memory of a generation of Berliners.
sentences.cn: 这种荒凉的景象将深深铭刻在一代柏林人的记忆中。

sentences.en: This terrible event is etched forever in my memory.
sentences.cn: 这一可怕事件永远深深地印刻在我的记忆中.

sentences.en: Tiredness and despair were etched into his face.
sentences.cn: 疲乏与失望刻在他的脸上.

sentences.en: Windows are etched with the vehicle identification number.
sentences.cn: 玻璃上刻着车辆识别码。

trans.tran_cn: 被侵蚀的，被蚀刻的，风化的
用针和酸类在金属板上蚀刻（图画等）( etch的过去式和过去分词 )，（感情）明显地表露在（脸上），（脸上）明显流露出（感情），铭刻在心里/记忆里/脑海里
trans.tran_en: If a line or pattern is etched into a surface, it is cut into the surface by means of acid or a sharp tool. You can also say that a surface is etched with a line or pattern.
